column6: I'm Missing this BIGTIME but then I found it at Bath and Body Works!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2020
column14: Why would a company discontinue something that has such favorable reviews? I miss this fragrance for my after-gardening shower. It used to put me in a magical state of mind. Peaceful and lovely. Like my garden.

column6: Great scent but not buying the climate pledge
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2021
column14: This is a very good smelling and thick so long last product. I would like to find the spray in the same scent but don't see it. Presuming the other reviewers are mistaken I can say what I've received multiple times was very pleasant but I can't truly compare to the store item.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
column14: I love twilight woods scent!  I get so many compliments when I wear it as perfume or bath in the smoothing bath gel .  I also use the body lotion as well!  Highly recommend this product.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
column14: I've always loved this scent and so did a teenager I worked with at a school.  We used it to relax her hand muscles and it was always her choice when 2 other options were presented (she was non-verbal).  I still love this scent now that I'm retired and have moved away from the town where I used to work.  To me, it's a beautiful scent, but to others, it may be "awful".  Everybody's olfactory (sense of smell) is different.  Sometimes Bath and Bodyworks scents can be overpowering.  This one was not!

column6: It smells watered down or like a cheaper product quality
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2018
column14: I don't know if this was a true bath and body works product or a knock off. The scent is off. It also doesn't seem to give the amount of lather as past bottles of this that I've had. This is the first time I have purchased this through Amazon instead of at the box store. I will buy at the actual store next time just to be able to check the smell to be sure they haven't changed the formula. It smells watered down or like a cheaper product quality.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2021
column14: I usually like bath and body works smells that others recommend but this is definitely an exception. It smells like the scent that your great aunt who has fluffy pink toilet seat covers and wreaths with dollar store sunflowers around her house would love. I asked my husband what he thought of it after getting out of the shower and he told me it smelled "better than his morning breath." I'm sure there are people out there who like this smell, but it is not attractive to me.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2021
column14: I think this product has the perfect fragrance and the greatest moisturizers for the skin.  So glad it was available.  The only thing that doesn't seem quite right it the cap. The snap up to push the bath wash out does not open as it should.  I have to unscrew the top each time I want to use it which is not convenient in the bath with wet hands.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2019
column14: This is my mother's favorite scent and as well all know it's retired from Bath & Body works. I figured I would try to look for it on Amazon. Turns out it's wayyy cheaper to buy on here than on the Bath & Body works website. Came perfect! Mother was happy!
